00025 /** 
00026  *  @defgroup ro_transceiver_spi  2.4 GHz Transceiver SPI Interface
00027  *  @code #include <transceiver_spi.h> @endcode
00028  * 
00029  *  @brief Routines for accessing the Freescale MC13192 2.4GHz Transceiver
00030  *
00031  * 
00032  * This Routines are for reading and writing to the 802.14.1 Transceiver 
00033  * using the SPI interface
00034  *   
00035  *  @note Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006 and 
00036  *        on the Freescale reference manual v1.5, 10/2005 for MC13192
00037  *                
00038  *  @author Rainer Ostendorf
00039  */
00040 
00041 /**@{*/
00042 
00043 #ifndef TRANSCEIVER_SPI_H_
00044 #define TRANSCEIVER_SPI_H_
00045 
00046 #include <inttypes.h>
00047 
00048 /* which CS the transceiver is connected to */ 
00049 #define TRANSCEIVER_CS 2
00050 
00051 typedef struct
00052 {
00053         int dataLength;
00054         unsigned char datan[130];
00055 } tx_packet_t;
00056 
00057 
00058 typedef struct
00059 {
00060         int dataLength;
00061         unsigned char datan[130];
00062 } rx_packet_t;
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 void write_to_spi( uint8_t spi_adress, uint16_t spi_data );
00067 void write_to_ram( uint8_t spi_adress, tx_packet_t *tx_packet );
00068 
00069 uint8_t read_from_spi( uint8_t spi_addr );
00070 uint8_t read_from_ram( uint8_t spi_adress, rx_packet_t *rx_packet );
00071 
00072 
00073 #endif /*TRANSCEIVER_SPI_H_*/
00074 
00075 /**@}*/
